name: Sembliance
description:
WASD to move. 

Space to Jump.

Left Click to switch to the world above you.

This is a small prototype I made for a game jam with about 10 hours of work. Swap between worlds to navigate your way to the sun. Carry your momentum and find the path forward. Different color tiles may have other effects to help you traverse the world. The two worlds you swap between are constantly getting closer together. Do you best to not get crushed. Traverse, and learn.
